track.name: Pure Shores
comments: The best pop song of the last 15 years, in my honest opinion.
I mean I thought it was "Pure Shoes" too.
I used to think it was "Pure Shores" too lol!
All this time I thought the title was "Pure Shoes".. /derp ._.

Listening to this again reminds me the great music`s time - the ending 90`s & begininng of 00`s. And by the way this song always makes me remember about Madonna`s album - Ray of Light - the same produce & type of arrangement :-) [2]..... BTW, I'm searching for more music albums like this, the incredible "Ray of Light", and if you know such records, please name them ^^
One of the best pop songs to ever exist. Definitely my favorite from All Saints.
there's just something so beautiful about the song that I just can't put my finger on.
Love the intro. The whole song is great though, it's a beautiful song.
This song reminds me of The Beach as well! [4]
Good song....
Better than about 99.9% of pop music now. Prove me wrong.
yes
This song reminds me of The Beach as well! [3]
Tune
:D
LOVE THEM BIG TIME<3

Listening to this again reminds me the great music`s time - the ending 90`s & begininng of 00`s. And by the way this song always makes me remember about Madonna`s album - Ray of Light - the same produce & type of arrangement  :-)
Listening to this again reminds me how a far chart music has fallen in the last few years.
i love the trip-hop background on this song.
